channel.title: I mean, Really? its actually getting annoying.(Newbs Read!)
channel.description:
I mean, it really does annoy me the amount of Topics named 'How do i make a server' Or something along those lines? It really does annoy me how those n0oBs wont take the time to read 'The Ultimate Server Guide' ([url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,37596.0.html]http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,37596.0.html[/url]).
[b]Why dont you take the time to read it ?[/b]
